cast.name: 雅各布·埃克隆德 Jakob Eklund

writer.name: 鲁卡斯·穆迪森 Lukas Moodysson

director.name: 鲁卡斯·穆迪森 Lukas Moodysson

this_title: En uppgörelse i den undre världen
trans_title: 地狱中的一个解决办法
introduction: 配乐完全是美妙的中国风韵呀！A small time gangster meet his son for the first time in several years. They have a dinner at a China restaurant. The gangster, played by Stefan Sauk, is nervous of the impression he makes on his son. Eventually he ask his son if he wants to work with him in his firm.Interesting short if you want to see a early Moodysson. Of the three shorts Moodysson made before Fucking Åmål this one is, imho, the best. It is also the final exam film for Moodysson from the film school DI (dramatiska Institutet).
chinese_title: 地狱中的一个解决办法
foreign_title: En uppgörelse i den undre världen
